testcase.name: runScenario["User is able to get a resource", "Optional[Test Json Placeholder API's]"](1)
testcase.system-out: @API @JsonPlaceholder @TC_001 Scenario: User is able to get a resource # src/test/java/features/api/API_Tests.feature:7 Given I set the base URI # stepDef.API_Steps.i_set_the_base_URI() When I send the API request to get a resource # stepDef.API_Steps.i_send_the_api_request_to_get_a_resource() Then I should get the response status as 200 # stepDef.API_Steps.i_should_get_the_response_status_as(int) And I should get "userId" as "1" in response body # stepDef.API_Steps.i_should_get_as_in_response_body(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And I should get "id" as "1" in response body # stepDef.API_Steps.i_should_get_as_in_response_body(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And I should get "title" as "sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit" in response body # stepDef.API_Steps.i_should_get_as_in_response_body(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And I should get "body" contains "quia et suscipit" in response body # stepDef.API_Steps.i_should_get_contains_in_response_body(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

testcase.name: runScenario["The User should be able to add tasks to the To Do list", "Optional[To do list]"](7)
